declaration.code: func endMatchInTurn(withMatch matchData: Data, leaderboardScores scores: [GKLeaderboardScore], achievements: [Any], completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)

overview:
## Discussion

Invoke this method only when the local player is the current participant. Also, set the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedParticipant/matchOutcome] property for each participant in the match’s [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/participants] property to a value other than [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/Outcome/none] before invoking this method.

To receive turn-based events that this method generates, register a listener that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventListener] protocol with the local player. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/starting-turn-based-matches-and-passing-turns-between-players].

# endMatchInTurn(withMatch:leaderboardScores:achievements:completionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Ends the match while submitting scores and achievements for all of the participants.

## Declaration

```swift
func endMatchInTurn(withMatch matchData: Data, leaderboardScores scores: [GKLeaderboardScore], achievements: [Any], completionHandler: @escaping ((any Error)?) -> Void)
```

```swift
func endMatchInTurn(withMatch matchData: Data, leaderboardScores scores: [GKLeaderboardScore], achievements: [Any]) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **matchData**: Your game-specific data representing the match state. For example, include information needed for the next participant to take their turn in this object. Don’t pass `nil` as this parameter.
- **scores**: The final scores that each participant earns in the match. The scores can be for different leaderboards.
- **achievements**: The achievements that each participant acquires in the match.
- **completionHandler**: The block that GameKit calls when it completes the request.

The block receives the following parameter:



## Discussion

Invoke this method only when the local player is the current participant. Also, set the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedParticipant/matchOutcome] property for each participant in the match’s [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/participants] property to a value other than [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedMatch/Outcome/none] before invoking this method.

To receive turn-based events that this method generates, register a listener that conforms to the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventListener] protocol with the local player. See [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/starting-turn-based-matches-and-passing-turns-between-players].

## Ending a Match

- **endMatchInTurn(withMatch:completionHandler:)**: Ends the match.
